channel.title: Shell on 2018 PI4 Computational Bootcamp
channel.description: Recent content in Shell on 2018 PI4 Computational Bootcamp

item.title: The Unix Shell
item.description: The Terminal (Unix Shell) “What is a command shell and why would I use one?” This tutorial is based on the Software Carpentry Unix Shell) lesson. We will refer to it for background information. Today we will learn - how the shell relates to the keyboard, the screen, the operating system, and users’ programs." - when and why command-line interfaces should be used instead of graphical interfaces. - similarities and differences between a file and a directory.
